body:
In the Duel screen, I know an error suppression was used so that a deck with an unimplemented card wouldn't cause a crash to desktop.

I think this would be handy for the new Deck Selection screen as it parses each deck, and if they have cards which aren't implemented, it then crashes.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Deck Selection Screen Crash

comments.body: Good point - I will look into it.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on July 08, 2014 01:45:36_

In the Duel screen, I know an error suppression was used so that a deck with an unimplemented card wouldn't cause a crash to desktop.

I think this would be handy for the new Deck Selection screen as it parses each deck, and if they have cards which aren't implemented, it then crashes.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=617_
